sentences.en: an attempt to subvert the democratic process
Do school counselors subvert young children?
sentences.cn: 学校辅导员会把年轻学生们搞乱 吗 ?

sentences.en: Does the novelist confirm, oppose, modify, or subvert the terms of the argument?
sentences.cn: 小说家会认定 、 反对 、 修正或颠覆对话内容的用语?

sentences.en: Fatty, sugary foods subvert evolved instincts, as do addictive drugs such as nicotine and cocaine.
sentences.cn: 高糖高脂食品,以及尼古丁、精 、 卡因等易上瘾品就在破坏人的本能.

sentences.en: Fatty, sugary foods subvert evolved instincts, as do addictive drugs such as nicotine, alcohol and cocaine.
sentences.cn: 高糖高脂食品,以及尼古丁 、 酒精、可卡因等易上瘾品就在破坏人的本能.

sentences.en: First, Mr Dawkins wants to subvert the mode of transmission between parent and child.
sentences.cn: 首先, 道金欲推翻父母同子女间传输信息的模式.

sentences.en: I subvert the whole world, only to straighten your reflection.
sentences.cn: 我颠覆了整个世界, 只为了摆正你的倒影!

sentences.en: I subvert the whole world, only to straighten your reflection.
sentences.cn: 我颠覆了整个世界, 只为摆正你的倒影.

sentences.en: On the other hand pathogens developed numerous strategies to evade and subvert dendritic cell functions.
sentences.cn: 另一方面许多病原体制定战略,以规避和颠覆树突状细胞的功能.

sentences.en: The court called Gill's actions during the murder trial an attempt to'subvert justice. "
sentences.cn: 法院称基尔在受审期间的行为是企图 “ 颠覆司法公正 ”.

sentences.en: They then tend to subvert their indicators by trading when the signal is not entirely clear.
sentences.cn: 于是在信号并不完全清楚时就交易,使得他们常常违反了他们的指标.

sentences.en: To subvert a man in his cause, the LORD approveth not.
sentences.cn: 36或在人的讼事上颠倒是非, 这都是主看不上的.

sentences.en: Who corrupt and subvert the very principles our constitution exists to uphold.
sentences.cn: 我们宪法所维护的准则被这些人腐化和破坏.

trans.tran_cn: 推翻, 暗中破坏, 搅乱
trans.tran_en: to try to destroy the power and influence of a government or the established system

trans.tran_cn: 颠覆，推翻，破坏，搅乱人心，败坏风化
